title: Mini-Ep 128: Skin Secrets with Dr. Pimple Popper
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 128: Skin Secrets with Dr. Pimple Popper
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree talk to dermatologist and pimple expert Dr. Sandra Lee (aka the one and only Dr. Pimple Popper). She answers listener questions like how (if possible) to safely pop zits, why we get butt pimples, how to prevent blackheads, and if zit sti...
description:
Kate and Doree talk to dermatologist and pimple expert Dr. Sandra Lee (aka the one and only Dr. Pimple Popper). She answers listener questions like how (if possible) to safely pop zits, why we get butt pimples, how to prevent blackheads, and if zit stickers really work.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

H&C ANIMAL HEALTH - For $3 off your order visit yourpetsdailydose.com and use promo code FOREVER35.

OXICLEAN - To work your magic with OxiClean, go to OxiClean.com/TRYME and order a free sample.

STORQ - Get 10% off your first order at storq.com with the code FOREVER35.

FIGS - For 15% off your first purchase from FIGS, go to wearfigs.com and enter promo code FOREVER at checkout.

RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
